WELCOME TO MY PORTFOLIO

About me

Hi ! I'm Arpit Tiwari

A Full-Stack Web-Developer based in Bengaluru

I have been working around Web-Designing for more than a year now. I enjoy building everything from simplistic business design to rich interactive web applications. I hope you find everything about me here. I am passionate about Web-Development and have worked on several tools including: React, Express, NodeJs, Tailwind, Bootstrap, MongoDB, MySQL, Git, GitHub. I'm an Engineering Graduate from Government Engineering College-Bilaspur, in Electrical Engineering. I've made numerous skill testing projects in the technologies mentioned. More recently, I've been Certified from iNeuron as a Full-Stack Web-Developer.

Want to have a discussion ?

About Me

I am a Full-Stack Web Developer based in Bangalore(Karnataka, India)and I work in JavaScript , I have been learning the language for eight months now. So far I have completed any task given to me. I love coding and I am looking forward to grow as Web-Developer. I pride myself as a dedicated learner. I love to utilize my skills for achieving the targets given to me, delivering best of my performance. I work to utilize creativity, my ideas and qualitative skills for the benefits of me, my team and overall development of the organization. Challenges are my motivation and I have firm belief in target oriented work.

HTML & CSS

Learned the fundamentals of HTML5 and CSS3 and I explored the concepts like Box-Model, CSS-Transformations, Structure-Layout, Tags-Attributes and Selectors, Media Attachments, Hyperlinks, Transitions & Animations, Screen-Responsiveness etc. which can be seen in the individual projects I have made

Aug-Oct 2022 | Course Certification from iNeuron, Learn Code Online (LCO)

PLC & SCADA | Supervisory Control & Data Aquisition

Worked with SCADA applications for Indutrial Processes, collecting data in real time from remote locations manipulating and controlling equipment and dynamic state, anticipation of conditions and automated system responses under challenging environment.

Nov-Dec 2017 | CRISP - Bhopal (MP)

MATLAB | Simulink

Under an in-house training program, worked with simulation of electrical networking, power system and control with data matrices. Projects and presentations were given as the part of certification course.

Nov-Dec 2017 | CRISP - Bhopal (MP)

Industrial Automation | PLC Program Application

Ladder Logic, Functional Block Diagram networks and Sequential Functions as an interface to the control system in Industrial Automation with hands on project implementation. Individual projects desgined and simulated in Siemens Automation's PLC controllers.

Dec 2016 | CRISP - Bhopal (MP)
